name: Men's 'Dread' Beret (Guristas)
description:
The Guristas pirates are highly organized on military lines, having been founded by renegade Caldari Navy officers, and the ‘Dread Guristas’ division are among the most feared and elite in their ranks.
Wearing this beret displays your loyalty to the Guristas, with a simple design and powerful symbolism rising above more than just a fashion statement.
